product_overview: A robust, scalable Learning Management System designed to empower students, instructors, companies, and administrators with comprehensive tools for education delivery, engagement, and monetization.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive and engaging platform for students to discover, enroll in, and complete courses.
Enable instructors to easily create, manage, and track courses and student progress.
Support company administrators in bulk enrollment and employee learning management with detailed reporting.
Facilitate secure, flexible payment and billing options including individual, bundle, and corporate purchases.
Offer administrators full platform control including user, content, payment management, and analytics.
key_features: Homepage with dynamic showcases such as featured courses, bundles, reviews, blog highlights, and expandable FAQs.
Course Catalog with advanced filtering, search, and special badges to facilitate course discovery.
Detailed Course Pages including intro video, syllabus preview, instructor bios, FAQs, reviews, and bundle integration.
Secure Payment Page supporting individual courses, bundles, corporate bulk purchases, and multiple payment methods with coupons and discount application.
Personalized Student Dashboard displaying enrolled courses, progress tracking, certificates, and recommendations.
Interactive Course Player integrating lessons, labs, assignments, quizzes, notes/Q&A, reviews, and course-specific FAQs.
Certificates section allowing viewing, downloading, and sharing earned achievements.
Bundles Catalog highlighting curated course bundles with discount rules and purchase options.
Dedicated Company Packages landing page and Company Dashboard for employee and learning management with billing and reporting.
Comprehensive Blog with SEO-optimized posts, categories, search, commenting, and sharing capabilities.
Global and Course-specific FAQ management accessible to all user roles.
Instructor Dashboard for course creation, content management, student activity monitoring, and earnings tracking.
Admin Dashboard offering full control over user management, courses, bundles, content, payments, analytics, and system configuration.
user_flow_summary: Students browse courses from homepage or catalog, filter/search, view details, and proceed to secure payment.
Upon purchase, students access the dashboard to track progress and continue learning in the course player.
Instructors log in to manage courses, upload content, interact with students, and review earnings and feedback.
Company admins bulk enroll employees, assign courses, monitor progress, and manage billing through the company dashboard.
Admins oversee platform-wide operations, manage users, approve courses, control content, and analyze revenue and engagement through the admin dashboard.
validation_criteria: All user roles (Student, Instructor, Company Admin, Super Admin) successfully authenticate with role-based access controls enforced.
Course creation, update, deletion, and content uploads function correctly in instructor and admin dashboards.
Payment processing completes securely across all supported methods with correct application of discounts and bulk purchases.
Student progress accurately tracked and reflected in dashboards, with certificates auto-generated upon course completion.
Company dashboards reflect real-time employee enrollment, course assignments, progress, and billing information.
Blog and FAQ management tools allow content creation, editing, publishing, and search/filtering.
Reviews submitted by students are visible to instructors and managed by admins.
Bundles and discount rules apply correctly throughout course catalogs, bundle views, and payment flows.
Admin dashboard provides comprehensive analytics and control over all major platform functions without errors.

features.name: getInstructorAnalytics
features.description: Calculates global metrics for an instructor including total students, revenue (from succeeded payments), and average ratings.

features.name: getCourseStudents
features.description: Retrieves real-time progress and profile data for all students enrolled in a specific course.

features.name: getInstructorCourses
features.description: Lists all courses created by a specific instructor.

features.name: getCourseEarnings
features.description: Fetches detailed earning records for an instructor's courses.

features.name: getStudentEnrollments
features.description: Fetches the 10 most recent student enrollments for an instructor's courses.
